forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with bright sunshine by the afternoon. High 16C. SSE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early, then sunny by the afternoon. High 61F. SSE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds. Low 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Thunder possible. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Thunder possible. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High around 15C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 59F. SSE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low around 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 41F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 20C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 67F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 62F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 9C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 59F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 47F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 57F. ENE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 58F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High near 60F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.
